short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alternative Content Alerter for eBay USA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension detects links to a comment system (forum) where all the comments end up which you leave via the complementing browser add-on “AltCon-US Commenter / Inserter”. 
To find the correct item and discussion you can click on links provided after submission by the “AltCon-US Commenter”.
You can also use this alerter “AltCon-US Alerter” to find the commented-on links on eBay. The links will pop up, you can’t miss them. This allows you to jump back and forth from eBay listing to forum comment.
Please watch our brief YouTube tutorial on how to make it all work.
